text:
👉🏻通过密室逃脱的情景游戏引出提取信息的知识点。
👉🏻分析文章《鸽子搬家》，第一步，读题，在题干中画出关键词。 第二步，引导孩子找出文章中的四要素，并引孩子用完整的语言进行表达。 第三步，根据题干中的关键词在文章进行定位，找到与题干部分相同或相似的内容。 第四步，联系上下文，按要求填写答案。
👉🏻分析阅读《放蜻蜓》，并用刚学过的提取信息的方法完成3个练习题目。
trans:
👉🏻 Introduce the concept of extracting information through an escape room scenario-based game.
👉🏻 Analyze the article "The Pigeon Moves House". Step 1, read the question and underline the keywords in the prompt. Step 2, guide students to identify the four key elements in the article and encourage them to express these in complete sentences. Step 3, use the keywords in the question to locate relevant parts in the article, finding similar or identical content. Step 4, connect the context to complete the answers as required.
👉🏻 Analyze the reading passage "Releasing Dragonflies" and apply the newly learned information extraction method to complete three practice questions.
